detail_desc: Trousers in an airy weave that can be converted to shorts. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, patch back pockets and legs that can be folded up with a tab and button.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jacket in washed cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Skirt in sequin-embroidered tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded, lined hood, high collar, zip down the front and side pockets . Lined.

Pyjama set with a long-sleeved top, a short-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a ribbed neckline and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Two-strand metal chain necklace. One of the chains has a bar-shaped pendant and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length.
Wedge-heeled mules in a jute blend with wide crossover foot straps and rubber soles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Shirt in soft, supple leather with a slightly wider collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets and press-studs at the cuffs. Straight-cut hem.
Calf-length dress in lace with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with gathered cuffs. Jersey lining.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides of the hem.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in soft, brushed wool twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with creases.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in jersey with a V-neck and twisted detail with a draped effect and cut-out section at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons at the front, a tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Straight hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Waistcoat in twill with buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem.
One thin metal chain necklace with a round pendant and one necklace decorated with semi-precious stones and plastic beads. Adjustable length 54–61 cm and 42–50 cm.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with wide ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, fake side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline, gathers at the shoulders, short puff sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in woven fabric with wrapover, draped bands of fabric with silicone trims at the top. Support panels at the front, a concealed zip at the back and elastication at the sides of the back. Seam at the waist and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.

Set with a hoodie and pair of leggings. Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in organic cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the waist.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared, knee-length skirt in cotton twill with contrasting colour details and an elasticated drawstring waist with a concealed press-stud placket at the front. Side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Top in soft velour with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a reflective print front and back, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Chinos in cotton twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a zip fly and button, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft, airy slub jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with plastic beads and hole embroidery on the shoulders.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton and recycled polyester blend with a ribbed collar and button band with matt press-studs down the front. Open chest pocket.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Flounced skirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with rounded lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Suit trousers in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Sleeveless dress with a sequined lace bodice, a visible zip at the back and flared skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 110x110 cm.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and a square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Flounces around the neckline front and back, and a seam at the waist.
Cropped top in stretch jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed button at the top. Lined.
Quilted, gently fitted, lightweight coat with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knee and elasticated hems.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the shoulders, buttons at the front and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorter, slightly boxy T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a heart-shaped button at the top, long sleeves and appliqués on the front.
Denim shirt with a collar, press-studs down the front and short, cut-off sleeves with raw edges. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a rounded hem with split seams.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Leggings in jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, covered heels and a shaft that is rounded at the top. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and hard-worn details on the front and sleeves.
Long sweatshirt in a soft cotton blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Outdoor jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front and side pockets with a contrasting colour zip. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Knee-length, pattern-weave skirt with a concealed zip at the back and decorative buttons.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a high collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a glittery button at the front and long sleeves.
Imitation suede desert boots with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a stretchy shaft and covered block heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
